topic.title: Discuss (U3): Volcanoes
topic.text:
Volcanoes are explosive! Have you been to see any in person?

Identify a volcano (active, dormant, or remaining crater) that you would like to visit.

  • Tell us about the volcano (type, features) and why it is of interest to you.

Please share whether or not you have experienced an active volcano in person. If you have:

  • Please identify where that was and describe your experience.

Please share whether or not you have experienced a dormant volcano or the remains of one. If you have:

  • Please identify where that was and describe your experience.

I have been to Hawaii to see the big island volcanoes flowing, and I visited a unique dormant volcano in the middle of Arizona.

http://www.nps.gov/sucr/index.htm

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59 pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59 pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
